document.full_text: web companies including google, facebook and akamai are joining forces on wednesday to test the internet's readiness for a future in which billions more people and devices will be connected.
document.title: web companies test internet's readiness for future
lines_and_colors: web companies including google, facebook and akamai are joining forces on wednesday to test the internet's readiness for a future in which billions more people and devices will be connected.
